title: tbe2077
author: tbe2077
content: There's a young kid called Trades By Sci or AMG Sci that gots insanely rich by trading forex NAS100. May I know what's your thoughts on it and how can we replicate the success like him? Are day traders that gots insanely rich a zero to one event or if you know what you do, you are able to make it to live lavishly?
